

 ###To find pg_hba.conf directory in linux
 sudo find / -type f -name pg_hba.conf

### To find pg_hba.conf directory in linux through runnning process
ps aux | grep postgres | grep -- -D

## To start a postgres server
sudo service postgresql start

## To stop a postgres server
sudo service postgresql stop

## To update ubuntu before installing software
sudo apt-get update

## To upgrade ubuntu before installing software
sudo apt-get upgrade

## To create a database in postgress
CREATE DATABASE todoapp;

### Initialize and activate a virtualenv using:
python3 -m virtualenv env
source env/bin/activate
#Deactivate virtualenv
deactivate
